pr_title: ENT-1851: Port CdnDTO to openapi spec

timeline.bodyText: Because the current CdnDTO has @JsonProperty/@JsonIgnore set to getId/setId respectively, we should also add the readOnly: true property to this field. Currently it doesn't seem like it does anything at all, but I'm investigating if anything can be done.
timeline.author: nikosmoum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -428,6 +428,23 @@ components:
             value:
               type: string
 
+    CdnDTO:
+      description: DTO representing a Cdn
+      allOf:
+        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TimestampedEntity'
+        - type: object
+          properties:
+            id:
+              type: string

replies.bodyText: Alright, since we're dropping the use of @JsonIgnore entirely, lets just leave this as is
replies.author: nikosmoum

timeline.message: ENT-1851: Port CdnDTO to openapi spec
ENT-1851: Port CdnDTO to openapi spec
